config.script:
# Send a message to changeTrend handler and include the trendType
	# in the payload. The handler on the Main view will update the
	# trend type, which will get passed down to this view.
	
	trendType = 0
	params = {'trendType':trendType}
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('changeTrend',payload=params,scope='page')

# Send a message to changeTrend handler and include the trendType
	# in the payload. The handler on the Main view will update the
	# trend type, which will get passed down to this view.
	
	trendType = 1
	params = {'trendType':trendType}
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('changeTrend',payload=params,scope='page')

# Send a message to changeTrend handler and include the trendType
	# in the payload. The handler on the Main view will update the
	# trend type, which will get passed down to this view.	
	
	trendType = 2
	params = {'trendType':trendType}
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('changeTrend',payload=params,scope='page')

# Send a message to changeTrend handler and include the trendType
	# in the payload. The handler on the Main view will update the
	# trend type, which will get passed down to this view.	
	
	trendType = 3
	params = {'trendType':trendType}
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('changeTrend',payload=params,scope='page')

# Send a message to changeTrend handler and include the trendType
	# in the payload. The handler on the Main view will update the
	# trend type, which will get passed down to this view.	
	
	trendType = 4
	params = {'trendType':trendType}
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('changeTrend',payload=params,scope='page')

# Send a message to changeTrend handler and include the trendType
	# in the payload. The handler on the Main view will update the
	# trend type, which will get passed down to this view.	
	
	trendType = 5
	params = {'trendType':trendType}
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('changeTrend',payload=params,scope='page')

transforms.code:
# Create the instances for this pen list, utilizing the entries in the 
	# trendConfig.allPens to know which pens are enabled.	
	
	instances = value['instances']
	instancesToReturn = []
	enabledPens = value['pens']
	
	for instance in instances:
		instanceToReturn = {}
		
		instanceToReturn['instanceStyle'] = instance['instanceStyle']
		instanceToReturn['instancePosition'] = instance['instancePosition']
		instanceToReturn['color'] = instance['color']
		instanceToReturn['group'] = instance['group']
		instanceToReturn['name'] = instance['name']
		
		if instance['name'] in enabledPens:
			instanceToReturn['enabled'] = True
		else:
			instanceToReturn['enabled'] = False
			
		instancesToReturn.append(instanceToReturn)
			
	return instancesToReturn

# Create the instances for this pen list, utilizing the entries in the 
	# trendConfig.allPens to know which pens are enabled.	
	
	instances = value['instances']
	instancesToReturn = []
	enabledPens = value['pens']
	
	for instance in instances:
		instanceToReturn = {}
		
		instanceToReturn['instanceStyle'] = instance['instanceStyle']
		instanceToReturn['instancePosition'] = instance['instancePosition']
		instanceToReturn['color'] = instance['color']
		instanceToReturn['group'] = instance['group']
		instanceToReturn['name'] = instance['name']
		
		if instance['name'] in enabledPens:
			instanceToReturn['enabled'] = True
		else:
			instanceToReturn['enabled'] = False
			
		instancesToReturn.append(instanceToReturn)
			
	return instancesToReturn

# Utilize the trendConfig.allPens to know which pens from the 'pens'
	# custom property to append to the pensToReturn list.
	
	currentPens = self.props.pens
	
	pensToReturn = []
	
	pens = value['pens']
	enabledPens = value['enabledPens']
	
	for pen in pens:
		if pen.name in enabledPens:
			historyPen = ({'axis':pen.axis,'data':pen.data,'display':pen.display,
			'enabled':pen.enabled,'name':pen.name,'plot':pen.plot,
			'selectable':pen.selectable,'visible':pen.visible})
			
			# To retain visibility settings.
			for currPen in currentPens:
				if pen.name == currPen.name:
					historyPen['visible'] = currPen.visible
					
			pensToReturn.append(historyPen)
			
	return pensToReturn

props.path: Building Automation Demo/Page/Trends/Framework/Ad Hoc Trends/Ad Hoc Trends

props.text: Max query range for demo: 2 weeks
